fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Tradesman: For every trade channel you open, you may upgrade a single card in your hand. 
- Townsfolk: Learn how many players you win with within a +/- 3 radius of you on the playerlist. Influenceable. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Reforge: Apply Reforge to a card in your hand. [3 uses, 2 CD]
- Upgrade: Apply Upgrade to a card in your hand. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Satchel: Apply Satchel to a card in your hand. [3 uses, 2 CD]
